name: Christopher Holland
text: We arrived at this spot for a meeting. we heard about this spot from a lot of people.  Well, it was a winning. the staff members were so friendly and we felt good. The meal was great. We loved this spot a lot and we will visit this place again. We recommend this place to all.

text: Monroe Pizza Hut out did themselves AGAIN with a huge order for out youth retreat.  Special thanks to Liz. Outstanding service

name: Alan Dean
text: They offer a fantastic range of fresh food. I enjoyed eating here. Employees are always super nice, rates are affordable and the spot is always well organised.

name: Dominique Ochoa
text: We like a lot eating out. Yesterday we arrived in this fine restaurant which friends told us about. We had a lovely experience there with first-rate dishes and an efficient team and an impressive chief cook. We  added this venue in our list  and we shall certainly come back very soon. We warmly recommend.

text: The service is always speedy, great character, helpful employees. I will return here again when I am in the area.

text: The Monroe Pizza Hut has good pizza. I don‚Äôt order delivery anymore after 3 bad experiences...waited 90-120 minutes each time and the pizza was stone cold. If I pick it up myself it‚Äôs fine. Love those Cinnabon rolls too!

text: My aunt got 3 take out pizzas. 1. Cheese. 2 buffalo chicken. 3. Veggie. The cheese pizza didn't get the standard red sauce and the buffalo chicken one had bacon on it! This is a household that doesn't allow pork. Thanks pizza hut! NEVER AGAIN!

text: I originally posted a 5 star review after only one visit. Since then we have tried the pizza on many occasions. Our pizzas are always made wrong or taste poor. Giving away the pizza does not make up for the customer service or making it incorrectly.

name: King B
text: I really hope the new one hires new ppl.  The staff at this one are awful and could careless about making quality pizza.  We love Pizza Hut and unfortunately this one is 10 mins from our house.  We drive to the Centerville location when we want Pizza Hut now.  It‚Äôs about 25 mins from our house.

name: Dave T
text: I dont think I have ever had service this bad. Tuesday night I order wings. They come not cooked inside upon calling and getting attitude from manager I get a credit. I order again Wednesday. Late order. Food cold. Missing items. Never again!

name: Alexander Prager
text: Pretty much the single worst chain pizza store I have ever dealt with.  I don't get pizza often, and usually when I do its because Pizza Hut has some crazy new pizza that sounds really interesting, but this store makes it worth not trying ‚Ä¶More

text: Honestly shouldn't have even paid for it! Got the tracker message saying it was on its way and ended up having to wait 30 minutes for 2 orders of cold bread sticks when they were NOT the right breaksticks i have ordered and half of them were burnt in both boxes. Worst service ever!

name: Will deBord
text: All the old reviews are just that...OLD...Pizza Hut has it together!!! Excellent pizza i remember and EXCELLENT CREW. No problems with ordering and no problems with delivery. Must have changed out the original crew and created an excellent team. Pizz Hutt will be my go to pizza place now!

name: Patrick Archer

text: Place is so disorganized and understaffed. Waited an hour in store for pick up when it said 20-30 minutes. They need more people working.
